title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When using the SWT example ControlExample, under the Text tab, clicking on Styles SWT.SINGLE and then back on Styles SWT.MULTI, the ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText component should not emit a beep sound when switching between Styles SWT.SINGLE and SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample.
SR:
1. Launch the SWT example ControlExample
2. Go to the Text tab
3. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE
4. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI
5. Observe that the ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound
